page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: As can be seen from the item counts the area has few recreational facilities. The most popular pastime in the area is coarse fishing which takes place on the canal and at Rode Pool in the grounds of Rode Hall.Both sites require a permit,Rode Pool being the more popular due to the larger stocks of fish. There is a local cricket club Rode Heath & Church lawton C.C.The ground being in the grounds of Rode Hall. Local children are invited to attend practices.People are allowed to walk in the grounds of Rode Hall if they possess a permit. All local pubs have a darts team. Most people use the Leisure Centre and Swimming pool at Alsager for their Recreational purposes.During school holidays transport is laid on.
